value.value: AF14

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>10</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A high-powered, fully automatic rifle. Developed in 2011, this new model boasts considerably higher firepower than the original. It has now been adopted as the EDF standard. In eight years of battling massive aliens on the field, it has delivered continuously strong results.
AF14-RA

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>200</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>6</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An upgraded version of the AF14. This RA model has an improved rate of fire, at a cost to range.
It can instantly riddle a target full of bullets. It's effective in close combat, but focus on the speed resulted in shorter range.
AF14-ST

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>10</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>3.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>70</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>250.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An ST model AF14 upgrade that sacrifices firing speed for power and range. However, since it is the first ST model developed, shots travel slowly, making it ineffective against fast-moving targets.
Fusion Blaster

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>900</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>60.0/sec×900</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>25</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>----</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>S+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An ultra high-energy laser gun. It has a short range, but it has the destructive power of a tank. It has the greatest possible firepower for a personal weapon. However, that tremendous energy is difficult to control, and once the trigger is pulled it will fire at full energy until weapons are switched. Reloading it with energy requires significant facilities, meaning that it isn't possible to do this on the field.
AF14-RAR

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>60.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>5.4</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An upgraded AF14-RA that fires an incredible 60 shots per second,  resulting in overwhelming damage when all rounds hit. Ammunition, however, is used up quickly, and the weapon must be reloaded frequently. It also has a short range.
AF14-B3

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30                        </font>  Zoom: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2x</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0/sec×3</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>40</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>240.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A-</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An upgraded AF14. This model fires 3-shot bursts in place of the full-auto function. There is no recoil from rapid-fire shots, so accuracy is unaffected. Range is also improved. (This weapon has no auto-fire)
AF15

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>17</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>138.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A new, vastly improved AF series model with firepower almost double that of the AF14. Range is only slightly decreased in exchange.
AF15-ST

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>8</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>3.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>105</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>256.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This ST model AF15 sacrifices firing rate for power. It cannot fire rapidly, but has great firepower and doubled range. Additionally, the slow shot speed typical of ST models has been remedied, making this an effective weapon against fast moving targets as well.
Fusion Blaster G1

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1500</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>60.0/sec×1500</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>35</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>----</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>S+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An enhanced 'Fusion Blaster' version of the laser gun. It has increased destructive power, can be used longer, and it is easier to handle. It has a short range, but it has the destructive power of a tank. It has the greatest possible firepower for a personal weapon. However, that tremendous energy is difficult to control, and once the trigger is pulled it will fire at full energy until weapons are switched. Reloading it with energy requires significant facilities, meaning that it isn't possible to do this on the field.
AF16

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>100</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>23</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>180.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A new AF series model. With improved firepower and vastly increased range, this weapon is extremely effective in mid-range combat. Ammo capacity is slightly decreased in exchange.
AF-V

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>105</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12×2</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>180.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A special AF series model. This assault rifle combines two guns to fire 2 bullets simultaneously in a V pattern.
AF16-RA

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>200</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>C</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This coveted AF16 upgrade boasts an improved rate of fire without sacrificing power. Accuracy, however, is severely decreased in exchange, giving it more of a shotgun-like feel.
AF17

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>26</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>180.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A new AF series model. This superb weapon features improved firepower. It no longer suffers from poor ammo capacity and has excellent overall balance.
AF18

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>15.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>80.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A new AF series model developed primarily for a high bullet velocity, making it possible to aim accurately at agile enemies. Range, on the other hand, is extremely short.
AF18-RA

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>250</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>18</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This rapid-firing AF18 upgrade does not suffer from the short range of other RA models. The AF18's high velocity is somewhat compromised, but it has excellent overall balance. Accuracy is also improved, given a skilled hand.
AF18-X

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>140</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>50</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>E</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A special AF18 model developed primarily for firepower. It is nearly twice as powerful as the AF18 but accuracy has been severely compromised, making this weapon feel more like a shotgun.
AF19-ST

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>10</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>4.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>230</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>300.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An upgraded ST model AF19 that sacrifices rate of fire for power. Firepower, accuracy, and range are all very high. It can also be said to have the fastest bullet velocity of any assault rifle.
Fusion Blaster G2

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1500</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>60.0/sec×1500</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>90</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>----</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>140.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>S+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An enhanced 'Fusion Blaster' version of the laser gun. Its destructive power has been increased dramatically. It can be used longer, and it is easier to handle. Its range is greater, and it has the destructive power of a tank. It has the greatest possible firepower for a personal weapon. However, that tremendous energy is difficult to control, and once the trigger is pulled it will fire at full energy until weapons are switched. Reloading it with energy requires significant facilities, meaning that it isn't possible to do this on the field.
AF19

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120                       </font>  Zoom: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2x</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>15.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>44</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This new AF series model has no outstanding strong point, but successfully improves on firepower without sacrificing overall performance. It is a great weapon with no particular disadvantages.
AF19-RA

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>250</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>30.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>33</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>5.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>200.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This upgraded RA model AF19 no longer suffers from short range. In fact, it has a longer range than the standard AF19. However, it uses a special magazine that takes slightly longer to reload.
AF19X-B3

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>120                       </font>  Zoom: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2x</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0/sec×3</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>150</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1.5sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>247.5m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
Developed for greater firepower, this AF19 upgrade features a wider barrel. Full-auto fire has been replaced with a 3-shot burst to suppress the greater recoil. (This weapon has no auto-fire)
AF20

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>140</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>12.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>92</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>180.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A-</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This new AF series model is considerably improved all around. Range is increased as well.
AF20-ST

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>5</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>4.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>1200</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>5.0sec</font>

          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>S+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An ST model AF20 that sacrifices rate of fire for outstanding firepower and bullet velocity. The trade-offs are a reduced ammo capacity and a longer reload time.
AF20-RAR

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>999</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>60.0/sec</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>26</font>

          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>B</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
This RAR model AF20 upgrade boasts the fastest rate of fire, clearly surpassing that of RA models. Additionally, magazine capacity has been greatly increased by minimizing bullet size.
AF21-B4

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>          Capacity: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>140</font>  
               ROF: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>2.0/sec×4</font>  
            Damage: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>260</font>  
       Reload Time: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>3.0sec</font>  
             Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>300.0m</font>  
          Accuracy: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>A+</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
An AF20 upgrade. This model exchanges full-auto fire for a burst mechanism to improve accuracy. The resulting reduction in recoil also enables greater precision. (This weapon has no auto-fire)
Fusion Blaster DA

A giant guided missile with a focus on destructive power. It has a good lock-on range, so it can attack from afar. Its firing speed is slow, but its homing capabilities are excellent. After being fired, it will descend a little, so it is necessary to aim upwards to avoid injury to yourself. As this is a prototype, its essential destructive power is not as great as it could be and its lock-on time is relatively long. Press the attack button to begin the lock-on, then capture the enemy within lock-on range with the sight (red square). The sight will change shape when it has locked-on. Release the button to fire.

Holding down the attack button will increase the Vibro Drive output. Releasing the button will unleash a three stage attack. The second stage attack is a long high voltage attack. When the output has increased to maximum, a maximum voltage attack will be unleashed. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your power frame needs to be equipped with a Side Thruster. Push the use button to perform a high speed dash. 

The Vibro Drive is not suitable for fast rapid attacks. If you want to engage with a large number of giant insects, equipping two hammers at the same time is standard.

It does not have the destructive power of the Vibro Hammer, but its attack speed is better and it can attack aerial enemies. Holding down the attack button will increase the output. When the output has reached maximum and you release the button, a powerful slash attack will be unleashed. 
When you anticipate engaging with multiple enemy creatures, it is recommended that you equip two Force Blades concurrently. Using two together is the true strength of the Force Blade. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your power frame needs to be equipped with a Side Thruster. Push the use button to perform a high speed dash.

A mechanical spear. A high speed attack. Rotating the spear will penetrate an object. After that, high-pressure plasma will be released from the end, destroying the object from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. It is also possible to use it with a shield. This is the primary weapon of a Fencer. It has short range, so it is necessary to get accustomed to it. It is a valuable weapon. During a continuous attack, the second attack will be a rush. These attacks can be sustained over a long period. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your power frame needs to be equipped with a Side Thruster. Push the use button to perform a high speed dash.

<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A mechanical spear that incorporates an acceleration mechanism. As a result of the improvements which allow continuous attack, it does not have the strength of a normal Blasthole Spear. However, it can inflict continuous attacks. Holding down the attack button will launch multiple attacks. Rotating the spear will penetrate an object. After that, high-pressure plasma will be released from the end destroying the object from within. The expansion and contraction of the spear are instantaneous, making it an extremely fast attack. It is only effective at close range, but its destructive power is formidable. It can penetrate multiple targets with its power. It is also possible to use it with a shield. 

To use this weapon effectively, the back of your power frame needs to be equipped with a Side Thruster. Push the use button to perform a high speed dash.

<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A special alloy shield. It has impressive defensive power, but the heat will increase as the attacks continue. When it reaches its limit, it will not be usable until it has cooled down. With the attack button held down, the shield will be up and reduces damage taken. It is possible to attack when the shield is up, depending on the weapon. It is not possible to use with a hammer or blade that requires the use of the whole body, but with a Blasthole Spear or a weapon that can be held with one hand, it is possible to use the shield. Moreover, the shield has a device called a deflector installed on the inside. This is special technology gained from the Ravagers and it forms a 180 degree magnetic field. The deflector is activated with the use button. It starts in a moment, and with the right timing it can repel any attack.

When the laser guide location is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. Because it is an attack from above, obstacles such as buildings will have little impact. The lock-on speed is fast and it is possible to attack several enemies. It is an easy-to-use weapon. 
Holding down the attack button will display the sight (red square). When a target is captured with the sight (within the lock in range), lock-on will begin. Releasing the attack button will unleash a missile on the locked-on target.

It is necessary to have the support of an Air Raider's Laser Guide Kit. The target will be confirmed using the laser guide to locate the lock-on. When the laser guide location is within the sight (red square), pressing the attack button will lock-on. After the lock-on, releasing the attack button will launch the missile. The missile will fly at the targeted location. On impact it will cause a large explosion, inflicting damage to the area. 
The explosion is impressive and the range is wide, but the lock-on takes time, so be careful during operation.

Laser Guide Kit

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>       Laser Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>700.0m</font>  
     Lock-on Speed: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>3x</font>  
  Lock-on Distance: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>3x</font>  
<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
Device that sends the lock-on information to your allies' homing weapons (missiles etc.) The device has no ability to attack by itself. 
 
By projecting a laser to a spot, it 'paints' the target, confirming the location for an allied lock-on target weapon. The lock-on time for your allies' homing weapons is greatly reduced. Also, the range is extended up to 3 times their own range. (For example, if the Fencer has a weapon with a lock-on speed of 3 seconds and a lock-on distance of 100m, he can lock on the target that is up to 300 meters away 1 sec later when the Air Raider uses this weapon.)
 
The homing weapon locks on to the point indicated by this weapon, not the enemy itself. When your allies launch the homing missile, it will head in the direction indicated by the laser. Therefore, if the laser is moved after launch, the missile will move accordingly. For that reason, the laser needs to be maintained until the target is hit.
 
Usually only one missile can be launched per lock-on, but it is possible to have multiple lock-ons for the laser point. It is therefore possible to launch multiple missiles at one target.  
 
The majority of Fencer missiles rely on the support of this device. When Fencers are equipping missiles, you should equip this device as well.
High-speed Laser Guide Kit

<font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffffff%dq%>       Laser Range: <font face=%dq%$FixedFont%dq% color=%dq%#ffff00%dq%>200.0m</font>

<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>

<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A device that discharges a beacon to offer lock-on information. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Enemies that have been hit by the beacon will not be able to escape. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

<font face=%dq%$NormalFont%dq% color=%dq%#80c3f5%dq%>
A device that launches a high-output guide beacon. It does not have much capacity, but the information output is high. When locked-on to a beacon, it is possible to lock-on within 4x the lock-on distance. Also, the time necessary to lock-on is reduced. The beacon focuses on a hit point and transmits location information. The beacon confirms the lock-on target for ally tracking weapons, making it possible to lock-on. The lock-on time is reduced and the lock-on range is increased. Even though it does not have the performance of the Laser Guide Kit, it has a wide variety of uses as it is not necessary to maintain the beacon until the target has been hit. It is possible for multiple lock-ons. By using the beacon on the enemy, it is possible to launch multiple missiles at the enemy. Also, the target can be attacked many times as the beacon will not be lost even after the missile has hit. Pressing the reload button releases the beacon, then it reloads.

A huge combat vehicle of 25 meters in length. It is a moving fortress developed for land combat with the giant insects. It is the strongest force in the EDF. It has a main battleship-class cannon and two rotating turrets. The vehicle has thick armor and impressive defense capabilities. But this makes it heavy, and reduces its mobility. 
The main cannon is the EDF's state-of-the-art Requiem Gun. Originally developed as a naval gun, it has been equipped on tanks by reducing the size of its barrel. This has resulted in the initial velocity being reduced, so some skill is necessary to hit a target. The name of this gun is inspired by a requiem played upon someone's death. 
There are two sub-cannons located on the top of the main cannon. It can fire armor-piercing ammunition which fragments, so one shot can hit many enemies. The main cannons and sub-cannons all rotate. The sub-cannons are located on the top of the main cannon so when the main cannon rotates, the direction of the sub-cannons will also change. It is equipped with a missile launcher on the left and right to prevent giant insects from approaching.
